oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some of the Difficult Aspects of Getting Into Production Medicine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, Andrew P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production medicine
veterinary practice
production medicine program
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Production medicine is the newest kid on the block and by all indications is the future of veterinary medicine. This challenge has frightened many veterinarians and have made their futures unclear. I have found production medicine to be one of the most rewarding programs I have ever offered to my clients and is now the backbone of a successful practice. I have been asked today to discuss the difficulties that went into making a production medicine program work and I hope to share these with you.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 2; 227-228
